text: Micropleurotoma is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Horaiclavidae ==Species== Species within the genus Micropleurotoma include: * Micropleurotoma melvilli (Sykes, 1906) * Micropleurotoma remota (Powell, 1958) * Micropleurotoma spirotropoides (Thiele, 1925) * Micropleurotoma travailleuri Bouchet & Warén, 1980 ==References== ==External links== * Tucker, J.K. 2004 Catalog of recent and fossil turrids (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Zootaxa 682:1-1295. * Kantor Y.I., Harasewych M.G. & Puillandre N. (2016). A critical review of Antarctic Conoidea (Neogastropoda). Molluscan Research. DOI: 10.1080/13235818.2015.1128523 Category:Horaiclavidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Micropleurotoma
